description: Project list management with CRUD operations - extracted from projects/page.tsx monolith (Phase 1 of 7)

behavioral_assertions.description: Component displays list of all projects ordered by creation date
behavioral_assertions.verification: Mock getProjectsList query with desc order, verify projects render in correct order

behavioral_assertions.description: Component shows total budget for each project in project header
behavioral_assertions.verification: Mock project with cost data, verify calculated total displays

behavioral_assertions.description: Component shows 'No projects found' when project list is empty
behavioral_assertions.verification: Mock empty array from getProjectsList, verify empty state message appears

behavioral_assertions.description: Component creates new project when form submitted with valid data
behavioral_assertions.verification: Fill project form, mock createProject mutation, verify success toast and project added to list

behavioral_assertions.description: Component deletes project with confirmation dialog
behavioral_assertions.verification: Click delete, verify confirm dialog appears, mock deleteProject mutation, verify project removed

behavioral_assertions.description: Component auto-expands first project on initial load
behavioral_assertions.verification: Load component, verify first project in list is expanded automatically
